title: Project crafting
body: What do I with all this leftover stuff now that the event is over? I REALLY dont want it to just sit in my crafting thing forever but there is no way to get rid of it. Unless there will there be another project crafting thing later down the road where I can use left over materials from this one, but If there is not going to be one this will bug the shit out of me {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: We'll be rolling out disenchanting for the PROJECT: Disruption materials in the future, so you can clean up your Hextech crafting page. I don't have a specific time or date when that will roll out, but let me know if you have any questions.
